definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海带摄取的营养物质和海带多糖的量极少。

sentences.english: The content of sulfated group in polysaccharides functions importantly on their biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸基含量对多糖的生物活性起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.english: The Pharmacological functions of fungi polysaccharides were well studied and have drawn much attention.
sentences.chinese: 真菌多糖的药理作用已得到广泛的研究与关注。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of marine algal polysaccharide on immune function of irradiated mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察海藻多糖对辐射损伤小鼠免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The content of polysaccharides in protocorm is higher than that in test-tube plantlet .
sentences.chinese: 结论铁皮石斛原球茎多糖含量比试管苗多糖含量高。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The content of polysaccharides in protocorm is higher than that in test-tube plantlet .
sentences.chinese: 结论铁皮石斛原球茎多糖含量比试管苗多糖含量高。

sentences.english: In diabetes, there is too much sugar in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病是血液里有太多糖。

sentences.english: Characterization of newly synthesized collagen and proteoglycan was performed.
sentences.chinese: 对新合成的胶原和蛋白多糖进行特征性描述。

sentences.english: Tea polysaccharide is a kind of acid mucopolysaccharide, has the significant effect on reducing blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 茶叶多糖是一种酸性粘多糖，具有显著降血糖效果。

sentences.english: Tea polysaccharide is a kind of acid mucopolysaccharide, has the significant effect on reducing blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 茶叶多糖是一种酸性粘多糖，具有显著降血糖效果。

sentences.english: The mucous cells secrete acid mucopolysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 黏液细胞分泌酸性黏多糖。

sentences.english: It recognizes lipopolysaccharide, a component of the outer membrane of Gram-negative bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 它识别广泛存在革兰氏阴性菌细胞外膜上的脂多糖。

sentences.english: Try not to overdo it on the sugars and starch.
sentences.chinese: 不要吃太多糖类食品和淀粉。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the diversities of polysaccharides content of Dendrobium candidum and its test-tube culture.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较铁皮石斛试管培养物与原药材的多糖含量。

sentences.english: Body surface of pine wood nematode is covered with a layer of viscous polysaccharose.
sentences.chinese: 松材线虫体表具有一层粘液状多糖物质。

sentences.english: Methods Polysaccharides of Codium fragile were extracted by using hot water extraction and ethanol precipitation.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用热水浸提乙醇沉淀法制备刺松藻多糖。
